concept.title: Release 1.3 information
concept.shortdesc: This section contains information about release 1.3 of DITA Open Toolkit: system requirements, supported applications, new and enhanced features, upgrade impacts, and known problems.

prolog.author: Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)
